page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: { Crickhowell}has spread out over the years.A typical house is : No.18 {BROOKFIELDS }(Maes-yr-afon) It is a modern estate,built by Algrey,a Midlands company. MATERIALS USED: { Block}&{bricks}with{PVC}facing { Concrete tiles}on roof The doors are{hardwood}with{glass { panes The windows have{softwood}frames. There is a{double garage INTERNAL: {Downstairs}fitted kitchen,cloakroom, lounge,dining room and a storage space under the stairs {Upstairs}four bedrooms,bathroom and an airing cupboard. EXTERNAL: Small open front garden.Garden to rear and sides to grass.French window to patio at rear.
